resources.string:
Word Plus is a vocabulary app that aims to improve your Swedish vocabulary in the best way possible. If you are learning Swedish language, this app allows you to create your own Swedish word list. A very simple and an effective way to improve your Swedish vocabulary. If you are preparing for SFI or simply planning to improve your Swedish vocabulary, then this app is for you. Word Plus includes an offline English to Swedish dictionary as well, you can add words from dictionary to your own word list. 

Features:
 - Add/Edit/Delete words with meanings and examples.
 - Search word in the word list.
 - Random word quiz for test your vocabulary skills.
 - Statistics about words of your word list.
 - Includes an offline English to Swedish dictionary.
 - Backup your word list to pdf file or email.
